title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 117.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 117.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) CASA program means a court appointed special advocate program structured and
administered as provided herein. (b) Grant recipient means any
organization receiving funds pursuant to this Part. (c) Chief administrator means
the Chief Administrator of the Courts or his or her designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
117.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
